#summary Describes the Object class and its methods

=Object=
==Constructor==
{{{
Object(coord_x, coord_y, label)
}}}
where:

    _coord_x_ = x position of the box; 

    _coord_y_ = y position of the box; 

    _label_ = defines the kind of the object (eg: "dac~", "osc~ 440"); 

==Methods==

===Edit===
edits the number to a specific value.
{{{
edit(new_label)
}}}
where:
    new_label = new label of the object;
